import React from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; import { Home, Image as ImageIcon, BookOpen, LogOut, LogIn, UserPlus, Search } from 'lucide-react'; import { useState } from 'react'; const FloatingMenu = () => { const { isAuthenticated, logout } = useAuth(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleLogout = () => { logout(); navigate('/login'); }; const [mobileMenuOpen, setMobileMenuOpen] = useState(false); return (
{/* Hamburger icon for mobile */} {/* Mobile Overlay Menu */} {mobileMenuOpen && (
{isAuthenticated ? ( <> setMobileMenuOpen(false)}> Home setMobileMenuOpen(false)} > Your Photos setMobileMenuOpen(false)} > AI Search setMobileMenuOpen(false)}> Publications ) : ( <> setMobileMenuOpen(false)}> Home setMobileMenuOpen(false)}> Publications setMobileMenuOpen(false)} > Login setMobileMenuOpen(false)} > Sign Up )}
)} {/* Mobile sidebar (left) is replaced by overlay menu */} {/* (No vertical bar for mobile) */} {/* Tablet/Desktop floating menu (top) */}
{isAuthenticated ? ( <>
Home
Your Photos
AI Search
Publications ) : ( <>
Home
Publications
Login
Sign Up )}
); }; export default FloatingMenu;
